brainly_data.question: Label the map to show how the northwest ordinance regulated slavery.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Label the map to show how the northwest ordinance regulated slavery.
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
No slavery was to be allowed in the new western territories. 

The area governed by the Northwest Ordinance was the Ohio Valley to include the current states of Ohio, Indiana, Michigan, Illinois, Wisconsin, and part of Minnesota.
